metadata.title: CVE-2017-2918 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the Image loading functionalityof the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c. A specially crafted.blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflowwhich can allow for code execution under the context of the application. Anattacker can convince a user to open the file or use it as a library inorder to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
